section: Building a Cat Image Classifier using Neural Networks from Scratch
text:
Building a Cat Image Classifier using Neural Networks from Scratch


This project showcases the implementation of deep learning algorithms from scratch for cat image classification using NumPy and SciPy in Python.
The neural network architecture is developed within a Jupyter Notebook, emphasizing the creation of layers, activation functions like ReLU and Sigmoid, and training procedures.
Quarto is utilized to convert the notebook into a webpage, presenting an accessible overview of the custom-built deep learning algorithms employed in the classification of cat images.
Repo Link: https://github.com/SherryS997/Cat-Image-Classification-Neural-Network-using-NumPy-and-SciPy

Exploring Regularization Techniques in Neural Networks for French Football Corporation





Field Tactic Image





This project explores the implementation of deep learning algorithms, focusing on neural networks and regularization techniques like L2 and Dropout, applied to optimize ball kicking positions for French football players.
The project was primarily built using Python’s NumPy and SciPy libraries to create the neural network from scratch.
The notebook has been converted into a webpage using Quarto.
Repo Link: https://github.com/SherryS997/French-Football-AI-Analysis

title: Sherry Thomas
section: Neural Image Style Transfer using PyTorch
text:
Neural Image Style Transfer using PyTorch


This project demonstrates the application of neural image style transfer using PyTorch, unraveling the fusion of artistic styles through convolutional neural networks (CNNs). The notebook encapsulates the essence of this transformative process, showcasing the amalgamation of visual styles from one image onto the content of another.
Emphasizing the power of pre-trained VGG19 models, this notebook delves into the intricacies of feature extraction, loss function definition, and iterative optimization. It highlights the orchestrated steps, from image preprocessing and feature analysis to the generation of stylized images, displaying the evolution of artistic transformations over multiple epochs.
The resultant notebook offers a comprehensive exploration of this creative fusion, unveiling the interplay between content and style representations, thereby serving as a foundational guide for those venturing into the realms of neural style transfer and artistic image manipulation.
Repo Link: https://github.com/SherryS997/Deep-Learning-with-PyTorch-Neural-Style-Transfer
